entries.journal_entry_description: Rydel is an aged, yet still powerful close combatant. Look to him for training in the arts of close combat, for surely no one is his equal.
entries.journal_entry_title: Speak to Rydel to learn the basics of close combat
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Rydel can teach you all the basics of melee combat. Talk to him in the Close Combat Training Room, next to the Medical Center.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Talk to Rydel Delan in the Close Combat Training Room
